translation.textAboutP1.1: My first contact with the programming area was through a systems development course. In which I was able to immerse myself in programming logic and learn the fundamentals of the
translation.textAboutP1.3: data structures. It was at that moment that I discovered my passion for creating solutions through code.
translation.textAboutP2.1: In 2023 I returned to programming studies, this time focusing on
translation.textAboutP2.2: Since then, I've dedicated myself daily to studying and improving my skills to become a complete web developer.
translation.barberStyleDescription: Complete scheduling system for barbershop. With sales page, login system, scheduling system and control panel. Created with React JS, using Firestore as database.
translation.bitCentDescription: Financial management project created from the Transformação Dev event. Contains Login system, income and expense registration and Landing Page.
